qas.question: What armenian land borders are open?
What is the status of the border controls in georgia and iran?

answers.text: neighboring countries retain their own strict border controls

paragraphs.context: On 12 January 2021, Armenia reopened its land borders with Georgia and Iran to foreign nationals. However, both neighboring countries retain their own strict border controls in response to COVID-19. You should check Georgia and Iran entry/exit requirements before attempting to cross land borders to/from Armenia.

qas.question: Where do i have to wear a mask in armenia?

answers.text: in all public or private transport, and in all public spaces

paragraphs.context: You must wear a facemask in all public or private transport, and in all public spaces. Breaches of mask-wearing protocols are subject to a 10,000AMD fine. You should follow the advice of the Armenian authorities on permitted activities.
